alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Utah Valley (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 10:41PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Utah and southeastern Tooele Counties through 1130 PM MDT... At 1041 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Tooele Army Depot South, or 15 miles east of Dugway English Village, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tooele, Dugway English Village, Lehi, Eagle Mountain, Cedar Fort, Vernon, Ophir, Tooele Army Depot South, Tooele Army Depot, Camp Williams, Skull Valley, Saratoga Springs, Stockton, Rush Valley, Fairfield and Faust. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Utah Valley
